text: Wrestling events at the 1987 Southeast Asian Games was held between 10 September to 12 September at Grogol Youth Center. ==Medal summary== ===Freestyle Men=== {| |- |(-48 kg) | Suryadi Gunawan | Luis Tibon | Sri Lakhana |- |(-52 kg) | Sukarman | Filippe Escote | Teng Bun |} ===Greco Roman Men=== {| |- |(-48 kg) | Suryadi Gunawan | Elmer Alegrado | |- |(-57 kg) | Sukarman | Teng Bun | |- |(-68 kg) | Rusdi | Juan Tauro | |- |(-82 kg) | Edi Santoso | Antonio Dime | |- |(-100 kg) | Sudirman | Jose Bereciarte | |} ==References== * http://eresources.nlb.gov.sg/newspapers/Digitised/Article/straitstimes19870911-1.2.56.38 * http://eresources.nlb.gov.sg/newspapers/Digitised/Article/straitstimes19870913-1.2.43.4 Category:1987 Southeast Asian Games Southeast Asian Games Category:Wrestling at the Southeast Asian Games Category:International wrestling competitions hosted by Indonesia
title: Wrestling at the 1987 Southeast Asian Games
